description: Working examples of Elemental 3 configuration files. Use these as templates.

files.product-manifest.yaml:
metadata:
  name: "suse-core"
  version: "0.0.1"
  upgradePathsFrom: [ ]
  creationDate: "2025-07-01"
components:
  operatingSystem:
    version: "6.2"
    image: "registry.suse.de/devel/unifiedcore/releases/0.6/containers/uc-base-os-kernel-default:0.0.1"
  systemd:
    extensions:
      - name: "elemental3ctl"
        image: "registry.suse.de/devel/unifiedcore/releases/0.6/containers/suse/uc/elemental3ctl:3.10-1.5"
        required: true
      - name: "rke2"
        image: "registry.suse.de/devel/unifiedcore/releases/0.6/containers/suse/uc/rke2-1.34:4.1-1.3"
  helm:
    charts:
      - name: "MetalLB"
        chart: "metallb"
        version: "0.15.2"
        namespace: "metallb-system"
        repository: "metallb"
      - name: "Endpoint Copier Operator"
        chart: "endpoint-copier-operator"
        version: "0.3.0"
        namespace: "endpoint-copier-operator"
        repository: "suse-edge"
    repositories:
      - name: "metallb"
        url: "https://metallb.github.io/metallb"
      - name: "suse-edge"
        url: "https://suse-edge.github.io/charts"
files.release.yaml:
name: "Unified Core"
manifestURI: "oci://registry.suse.de/devel/unifiedcore/releases/0.6/product/manifest:latest"
components:
  systemd:
    - extension: "clp"
  helm:
    - chart: "rancher"
      valuesFile: "rancher.yaml"
files.kubernetes.yaml:
helm:
  charts:
    - name: "rancher"
      repositoryName: "rancher-latest"
      version: "2.9.0"
      targetNamespace: "cattle-system"
      valuesFile: "rancher.yaml"
  repositories:
    - name: "rancher-latest"
      url: "https://releases.rancher.com/server-charts/latest"

manifests:
  - "https://github.com/rancher/rke2/releases/download/v1.28.10%2Brke2r1/rke2.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

network:
  apiHost: "rancher.example.com"
  apiVIP: "192.168.122.100"
files.butane.yaml:
variant: fcos
version: 1.6.0
passwd:
  users:
    - name: user
      password_hash: "$y$j9T$ExampleHash..."
      ssh_authorized_keys:
        - "ssh-rsa AAAAB3Nza..."
